faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our services

items.question: What services do you offer?
items.answer: We offer web development, mobile development, UI/UX design, and business consulting services. Each service is tailored to meet your specific business needs.

items.question: How long does a typical project take?
items.answer: Project timelines vary depending on scope and complexity. A simple website might take 4-6 weeks, while a complex application could take 3-6 months or more.

items.question: What is your pricing structure?
items.answer: We offer flexible pricing models including fixed-price projects, hourly rates, and retainer agreements. Pricing depends on project scope, timeline, and specific requirements.

items.question: Do you provide ongoing support?
items.answer: Yes, we offer comprehensive support and maintenance packages to ensure your project continues to perform optimally after launch.
